content: knitted hat neck warmer with saddle shoulder and mittens in drops merino extra fine the whole set is worked with cables and ribbed edging see the cool cables set neck warmer pattern here 1 see the cool cables set mittens pattern here 2 drops design pattern no me-209 **materials ** for the whole set drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 450-500 g colour 13 denim blue for the **hat ** **sizes** s/m m/l fits head size approx 54/56 56/58 cm drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 150-150 g colour 13 denim blue **knitting gauge ** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm **needles ** drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm for rib drops cable needle for cables 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/214-25-b-cool-cables-set-neck-warmer 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/214-25-c-cool-cables-set-mittens
